hero.subtitle: Learn English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Japanese with smart flashcards, instant camera translation, and real-time voice chat. Your journey to fluency starts here.

howItWorks.title: Learn naturally, master effortlessly
howItWorks.description: Master vocabulary across 7 languages with AI-powered tools. Swipe through smart flashcards, translate text from photos instantly, and practice conversations with real-time voice translation. Learn anywhere, anytime: at home, traveling, or on the go.

features.title: Everything you need to master any language
features.description: From smart flashcards to AI-powered camera translation and real-time voice chat: all the tools you need to achieve fluency in 7 languages. Set goals, track progress, and learn at your own pace.

item1.title: Smart vocabulary flashcards
item1.description: Master 7 languages with expertly curated word lists. Personalize your learning by creating custom lists, skipping words you know, and focusing on vocabulary that matters to your goals, whether for travel, work, or daily conversations.

item2.title: AI camera translation
item2.description: Translate text instantly from any photo. Perfect for airports, museums, menus, street signs, books, and documents. Point your camera, snap a photo, and understand any language in seconds. Your personal translator in your pocket.

item3.title: Real-time voice chat
item3.description: Practice conversations naturally in any of 7 languages. Speak into your mic, get instant translations, and hear responses with text-to-speech. Build confidence and fluency through real conversations, anytime, anywhere.

item4.title: Goal tracking & insights
item4.description: Watch your fluency grow with smart progress tracking. Set achievable daily goals, track your learning streaks, and celebrate milestones. Get personalized insights that keep you motivated and on track to mastery.

item5.title: Learn on your schedule
item5.description: Study when it works for you with flexible learning modes. Get smart reminders, practice offline, and sync your progress across devices. Whether you have 5 minutes or an hour, make every moment count toward fluency.

cta.title: Start your journey to fluency today
cta.description: Join thousands of learners mastering 7 languages with AI-powered tools. From smart flashcards to instant camera translation and real-time voice chat: everything you need to achieve fluency is in one app.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.subtitle: Quick guide to removing your Lexyk account and personal data
dataDeletion.intro: If you would like to delete your Lexyk account and associated personal data, you can do so directly from within the app:
dataDeletion.step1: Open the Lexyk app on your device
dataDeletion.step3: Scroll to the bottom and tap Delete Account
dataDeletion.warning: Important: Once confirmed, your account and personal data will be permanently deleted from our systems. This process cannot be undone.
dataDeletion.needHelpText: If you experience any issues deleting your account or have already uninstalled the app, please contact our support team:
dataDeletion.moreDetailsText: For comprehensive information about what data gets deleted, processing times, and legal compliance, visit our detailed account deletion page.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Your Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: We're sorry to see you go. This page will guide you through the account deletion process.
deleteAccount.warningText: Once your account is deleted, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers. This action cannot be undone, and you will not be able to recover your learning progress, saved vocabulary, or any other account information.
deleteAccount.method1Text: If you still have the Lexyk app installed, you can delete your account directly:
deleteAccount.method1Step4: Scroll down and tap Delete Account
deleteAccount.method2Text: If you've uninstalled the app or can't access it, send us an email:
deleteAccount.method2Item3: Confirmation that you want to delete all data
deleteAccount.whatDataGetsDeletedText: When you delete your account, the following data will be permanently removed:
deleteAccount.yourDataRightsText: We respect your right to data privacy. This account deletion process complies with:
deleteAccount.gdpr: GDPR - Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
deleteAccount.appStore: App Store - Privacy and data protection standards
deleteAccount.quickInstructionsText: For a simplified, step-by-step guide without the extra details, check out our quick data deletion instructions.
deleteAccount.needHelpText: If you have questions or concerns about deleting your account, our support team is here to help.
